import proseflow.text as txt
from proseflow.utils import pipe
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for s_func in txt.STRING_FUNCS: #PYTHON MAGIC
    exec("%s=getattr(str, s_func)" %s_func)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
clean_sentence = pipe(strip,
                     (replace, "\n", " ")
                     )
